languages.text: "Ибо праведность есть наше оружие, преданность — наша броня, а смерть за Него — наша цель и наш смысл. Услышьте весть мою и возрадуйтесь: Император защищает".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] А теперь встаньте в свете и пусть свет имератора дарует вам силу, Император защищает!

languages.text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."
languages.original_text: "Ибо праведность есть наше оружие, преданность — наша броня, а смерть за Него — наша цель и наш смысл. Услышьте весть мою и возрадуйтесь: Император защищает".

traits.locale_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."
"For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."
"For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."
"For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."
"For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

languages.text: “因为公义就是我们的武器，忠诚就是我们的盔甲，为祂献身就是我们的愿望与目的。聆听我的话，充满欣喜吧——帝皇会保护祂的子民。”
languages.original_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: “因为公义就是我们的武器，忠诚就是我们的盔甲，为祂献身就是我们的愿望与目的。聆听我的话，充满欣喜吧——帝皇会保护祂的子民。”

languages.text: «La justicia es nuestra arma, la lealtad nuestra armadura y morir en su nombre es nuestra aspiración y nuestra razón de ser. Escuchad mi palabra y regocijaos: el Emperador protege».
languages.original_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: «La justicia es nuestra arma, la lealtad nuestra armadura y morir en su nombre es nuestra aspiración y nuestra razón de ser. Escuchad mi palabra y regocijaos: el Emperador protege».

languages.text: 「正しさは我々の武器、忠誠は我々の鎧、そして皇帝のための死は我々の願望であり目的だ。我が言葉を聞いて喜べ。皇帝がお守りくださる」
languages.original_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: 「正しさは我々の武器、忠誠は我々の鎧、そして皇帝のための死は我々の願望であり目的だ。我が言葉を聞いて喜べ。皇帝がお守りくださる」

languages.text: "Denn Rechtschaffenheit ist unsere Waffe, Loyalität unsere Rüstung und der Tod für Ihn unser Hoffen und Streben. Hört meine Worte und freut Euch: Der Imperator schützt uns."
languages.original_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: "Denn Rechtschaffenheit ist unsere Waffe, Loyalität unsere Rüstung und der Tod für Ihn unser Hoffen und Streben. Hört meine Worte und freut Euch: Der Imperator schützt uns."

languages.text: « Car la vertu est notre arme, la loyauté notre armure, et la mort en Son nom notre aspiration et notre but. Écoutez-moi et réjouissez-vous : l'Empereur protège. »
languages.original_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: « Car la vertu est notre arme, la loyauté notre armure, et la mort en Son nom notre aspiration et notre but. Écoutez-moi et réjouissez-vous : l'Empereur protège. »

languages.text: "Silahımız doğruluk, zırhımız sadakat, arzumuz ve amacımız ise O'nun uğruna ölmektir. Sözlerime kulak verin ve şahlanın: İmparator korur."
languages.original_text: "For righteousness is our weapon, loyalty is our armour, and death for Him is our aspiration and purpose. Hear my word and rejoice: the Emperor protects."

traits.locale_text: "Silahımız doğruluk, zırhımız sadakat, arzumuz ve amacımız ise O'nun uğruna ölmektir. Sözlerime kulak verin ve şahlanın: İmparator korur."
